Package dao

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDictionary
    Defines methods a dictionary needs to provide.
    IDocumentTermList
    Defines the methods a documentTerm list needs to implement for a dictionary.
    IPostingsList
    Defines the method a postings list needs to implement for a dictionary.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectionStatistics
    From Terrier's CollectionStatistics.java.
    Dictionary
    Dictionary
    Document
    Stores document meta data (document ID, document name and document category)
    DocumentTermList
    Inverted PostingsList, this class stores one row in the DocumentTermMatrix.
    DocumentTermMatrix
    The inverse of an inverted index, this class stores a matrix with one row for each documentID and one column for each termID.
    DocumentTermMatrixFileEntry
    The inverse of a regular posting, this DAO stores an entry in the documentTermMatrix, which specifically entails: - the docID of the entry - the termID of the entry - the idf == value of the entry The Comparable interface is needed to allow the merging of documentTermMatrices, where the correct ordering of termIDs must be ensured.
    PostingsList
    PostingsList
    PostingsListEntry
    Small convenience DAO to store an intermediate block dictionary's individual posting entries, which consist of the term, the docID and the term frequency.
    RetrievalResult  
    Token
    A token as defined in "An Introduction to Information Retrieval" (Manning et al. 2009) is a term + docID pair.
    Vocabulary
    Stores terms (Strings) and their IDs (Integers).
    VocabularyEntry
    A vocabulary entry stores a term's ID and the associated documentFrequency.
